intro:
I'm moving to another ID provider and hub.
Now I'm at peeper@cryptoid.bit and ChameleonHub.
Follow Peeper in the [new profile](http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/?Profile/1N9sU8qh3S4ei9PHE1qQyYPbcckJomvwMd/1H3xhNXuLnqMLutZRk8tJMNG6tyr8mChxH/).

post.body: Hi, ZeroMe!

# Peeper
Updated version of the basic ZeroMe:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/

#Help us
Please go to [ZeroSites](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Sites.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Home), click in "New" (the green button in top) then see "Peeper" and upvote by clicking in the star. Thanks! :D

#Translation
## Peeper em portuguÃªs brasileiro
Peeper now has been completly translated to brazillian portuguese by @Plasmmer:.
Brazillian users without english language knowledges can now join and understand Peeper.

# Question
Do you talk to your friends/colleagues about privacy and security? What do you recommend to them?

#### New users count record
85 users.

I'm going to open a issue in ZeroNet's GitHub repo about the debug mode creating a new data folder, but the feeling of creating a issue in ZeroNet is to be a trash. When I created a few issues this year, a lot of people started insinuating that my suggestions are dumb or that the errors are in my side.

But I'll try again.

**Update**: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1007.

#### New users count record
96 users.

# News
Reorganized items in post sort menu.

#### New users count record
102 users.

# News
This is the new logo of Peeper.

# Question
ZeroNet has received 8.743 amount in Bitcoin, that converted to USD is 22,819K dollars. Its not enough to do a quick development to ZeroNet and call developers to do paid jobs?

For where exactly is going the money of the donors?
@nofish:

# News

The theme of Peeper is now yellow and orange.
If someone can't understand the difference between **Pepper** and **Peeper**, then this person have mental threats.
A lot of people can't understand that a lot of features here that are already in ZeroMe Reloaded was introduced in ZeroMe Reloaded by Plasmmer, the same creator of Peeper.

#### New users count record
140 users.

#### New users count record
150 users.

#### New users count record
180 users.

#### New users count record
194 users.

#### New users count record
200 users.

#### New users count record
228 users.

#### New users count record
232 users.

I seriously believe that ZeroNet is suffering a DDOS attack.
I saw 1732 seeds in ZeroName and 232 seeds in Peeper.
In less than 4 minutes ZeroName is with 1608 seeds and Peeper with 213.
@nofish: , what do you think about preventing custom clients that can download a site but doesn't seed?

The bug that prevented me for developing Peeper is now fixed:
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1007.
Thanks!

# News
Button saying that a post is seeded by a hub. Soon it will show a counter of seeds and in a future update, older posts will work as optional files to save space in hubs.

# News
New post button, with font-awesome icon.

#### New users count record
241 users.

#### New users count record
260 users.

#### New users count record
280 users.

#### New users count record
300 users.

# News
Donation page. It can speed up the development in Peeper.
(Its in portuguese because is my display language, **but for other users it will work in english**).
Please donate any amount to help Peeper development: http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/?Donate

# News
Resized the user settings button. It is for a upcomming update about the user profile pic in header.

# News
Resized these elements to give more space for the header and for upcomming updates.

#### New users count record
340 users.

# Announcement
Soon Peeper's design will be changed to Material UI Framework, and will support jQuery and mobile devices.
Please don't forgot to contribute: http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/?Donate. It can speed up the development of Peeper.

#### New users count record
360 users.

# Announcement
ZeroMe/Peeper needs with urgence a system to make the older posts as optional files. A lot of users had abandonned or create a new account because his hub limit was full, and importing data to a hub with highter limit isn't easy.
https://github.com/World-wd/Peeper/issues/54

#### New users count record
380 users.
Soon, details.

# News
Badges pages, where you can earn Open Badges for your achievements in Peeper.
I'm working in reverse engineering ZeroMePlus to introduce his features to Peeper.

#### New users count record
436 users.

#### New users count record
450 users.

#### New users count record
480 users.

No users count record. 600 users was fake in majority. ZeroNet sadly is under attack.
After I reported it to Nofish, he said that isn't in house and will return only in next month.
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1016
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1036
http://prntscr.com/g0y8fs

Read more:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:69_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv

comment.body: Also, why not to join Bountysource to offer money for who completes issues? It will also make the donation knowledge more transparent.
Liked by one user, shortcutme assigned, and HelloZeroNet tagged as 'bug'.

@Elspru: If you're at least intelligent, you can understand this:
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroMe/pull/74
@Nofish: Very good to hear. Thank you!
I'll not anymore direct my attention to fool comments from haters, but in the development.

@Mkg20001: "You can't claim all was done by you alone".
You too. But I'm sure you have better things to do instead of discussing this, like programming.
@Zhangsansan: Please talk only in english here.
@Drone621: Whats the logic to use ZeroNet and mute ZeroName? Is your brain/mind working enough?
@nofish: also these great volume of "users" are seeding in majority ZeroName against ZeroHello. It is normal?
@Drone621: I'm not only talking about Peeper. If you're talking about only thing, what about reading again?

@Sirenyc: 
Peeper is now the ZeroMe version of @Plasmmer: and it is fully translated to portuguese.

"Actually we have knowledged and serious users here".
Actually we can't say it.

And now Peeper is working.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/
You can see the sites you're seeding and the peer counter in: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D. This is the ZeroNet's start page.
@ScrubTheSecond: This is the count of all users in the registry, wich includes users of Dark ZeroMe, ZeroMe Reloaded, ZeroMe Plus and Peeper.
@Kaffie: "Users" doesn't means who are using, but who are seeding. If are seeding, then is because the seeder thinks it is usefull.
@Kaffie: Yes, because the "pause" function.

@Kaffie: Thanks for the tip. Then the proxies shows the real peer number?
So Peeper have 1284 peers?

@Comodopython: In the start page, Peeper will give the function to download all hubs, thanks for your suggestion. About the search bar in the header, it is already planned. Regarding the topics, I call this as "Hashtags" feature and I'll import it from ZeroMe Plus to make compatibility.
@Mkg20001: do you have any info about when the ZeroNet Android version will be released?
Mobile mode is also a need. A lot of users that uses 100% mobile devices are abandonning ZeroMe/Peeper because it doesn't works well.
@Kaffie: Good to know. Thanks.
https://twitter.com/openbadges
@Glightstar: My plans are to keep the old posts in the hub, then after reach the limit, the following posts will be optional files, like photos are.

@Glightstar: Because in the future I'll introduce a blockchain feature, and the hubs are needed for profile discovery (if the first peer is offline), then I can't make the old posts as optional files, only the following.
@Nofish: which updates you is planning for ZeroMe?

@Kaffie: Ok, I readed it all. Thanks :D I plan to clone ZeroID, since it keeps the names unique. The name will be CryptoID, and the future update will be a GIT "blockchain" that will keep the names unique. The server script for ZeroID is available somewhere?

@Kaffie: "On the backend of things, all users are identified through their auth_address, which is always unique".
Then, site creators should simply add a function to associate the username with the auth_address. But blockchain is better to solve it. Then I'll clone KaffieID, that doesn't relies in a centralized server.
Soon Peeper will accept only CryptoID signups, and unique names/respectable users will have a verified badge. For the badge, I'll lookup at ZeroTalk's code and use as inspiration, since the stickied posts are defined by the content.json.
**Update**: "Peeper will accept only CryptoID signups", but it doesn't work only for signups, but also for logins. I don't want users of ZeroID needing to signup in another provider just for use Peeper, its a "marketing" error. So I'll use ZeroID alongside CryptoID.
It isn't working here. Need more peers. Also, is it on GitHub?

@Glightstar: Thanks for seeding the peace :D
I was friend of Mk and I'm fan of his programming. My good thing is the creativity. I thinked we could be a great double in project developing, but I realised external groups don't wanted it.
@Kaffie: Hi.

Nofish doesn't seems to be so inactive.
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1041#issuecomment-317549836
